snippet: After weeks battling critical illness, Nelson Mandela spent his 95th birthday in the hospital on Thursday, and South Africans across the country celebrated Mandela Day.
abstract: Nelson Mandela spends his 95th birthday in the hospital, as South Africans across the country celebrate Mandela Day; authorities say Mandela's condition is steadily improving.

byline.original: By LYDIA POLGREEN and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Lydia Polgreen reported from Johannesburg, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: After weeks battling critical illness, Nelson Mandela spent his 95th birthday in the hospital on Thursday, and South Africans across the country celebrated Mandela Day.

headline.main: Mandela Said to Be ‘Steadily Improving’ on His 95th Birthday
headline.print_headline: Mandela Said to Be ‘Steadily Improving’ on His 95th Birthday
